attributes.action: west sussex A27 into a modern dual carriageway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This road which is listed as part of the strategic road network. Is for large parts single carriageway, which is subject to constant conjestion and above average road casualties.

rejection.details: Can you incorporate the point of your petition into the title?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
